entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
